channel.title: True Extremely Nice Compliments Only Thread
channel.description:
## Ever wanted to win an argument with extremely nice compliments? Well now you can!
Rules: Global forum rules still apply, so plz follow them. Try to be nice at all times plz.
Rules about voting: Try to not to be bias with your votes plz. Vote the person who has the best compliments in your opinion plz. Do not vote for yourself plz.
You may request to 1v1 another forum member to see who can win by compliments.
(wonder if this compliment version will get closed or not :thinking: )
